ThingDef.label: dewback egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized Dewback egg.

ThingDef.label: rancor egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized Rancor egg.

ThingDef.label: acklay roe (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized Acklay egg.

ThingDef.label: krayt dragon egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized Krayt Dragon egg.

ThingDef.label: gizka egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized Gizka egg.

ThingDef.label: porg egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized Porg egg.

ThingDef.label: bantha wool
ThingDef.description: Soft, light and provides very good insulation. Wool clothes can keep the body warm even in extreme conditions.

ThingDef.label: nerf wool
ThingDef.description: Soft, light and provides very good insulation. Wool clothes can keep the body warm even in extreme conditions.

ThingDef.label: mastmot wool
ThingDef.description: While somewhat matted, mastmot wool's interlocking fibers make it exceptionally warm.

ThingDef.label: coarse wool
ThingDef.description: While somewhat coarse, this wool offers some insulation.

ThingDef.label: taozin silk-wool
ThingDef.description: Sticky insectoid silk-wool squeezed from a taozins labial glands, it offers reasonable insulation and unusually decreases ones "connection to the force".

ThingDef.label: bantha horn
ThingDef.description: A bantha's horn. Good enough to fend off some enemies. Comes as at least a pair, so not as valuable as other horns out there.

ThingDef.label: krayt dragon horn
ThingDef.description: A krayt dragon's horn. Good enough to fend off some enemies. Comes as at least a pair, so not as valuable as other horns out there.

ThingDef.label: rancor skull
ThingDef.description: A rancor skull. Not only is it intimidating and beautiful at the same time, it speaks volumes .

ThingDef.label: blue milk
ThingDef.description: Blue milk from a bantha.

ThingDef.label: green milk
ThingDef.description: Green milk from a reek. The high tannin content makes this milk quite bitter, but it can be cooked to remove the taste.

ThingDef.label: rikknit ovum
ThingDef.description: The raw ovum sac of a rikknit creature. These are considered a delicacy when eaten, but they can be processed into an addictive substance called ji rikknit.

ThingDef.label: insectile hide
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, insectile skin. It is suprisingly tough but insulates poorly.

ThingDef.label: reptavian hide
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, skin. It is tough and somewhat beautiful.

ThingDef.label: reptomammal hide
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, skin. It is tough and insulative.

ThingDef.label: reptomammal fur
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, reptomammal fur. Smells bad but at least it insulates against the cold.

ThingDef.label: mammavian hide
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, skin. It is quite insulative.

ThingDef.label: crustapod chitin
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, crustapod chitin. Durable, but lacks insulation.

ThingDef.label: heavy hide
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, skin. It won't keep you warm but it is reasonably durable.

ThingDef.label: saurian hide
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, saurian skin. It has an unusual beauty.

ThingDef.label: dark hide
ThingDef.description: The pelt of an creature typically associated with the "darkside". This tough skin protects very well and is believed to increase ones "connection to the force".

ThingDef.label: bright fur
ThingDef.description: The pelt of an creature typically associated with the "lightside". This beautiful fur protects very well and is believed to increase ones "connection to the force".

ThingDef.label: fambaa hide
ThingDef.description: The pelt of an Fambaa. Harvested from a large, hardy animal. This thick skin protects very well.

ThingDef.label: gundark pelt
ThingDef.description: The pelt of a Gundark. Harvested from a large, predatory animal. This hide protects reasonably well and is quite beautiful.

ThingDef.label: lava flea chitin
ThingDef.description: The shell of a Lava Flea. It is exceptionally resistant to high temperature, but only provide average protection.

ThingDef.label: vapaad chitin
ThingDef.description: The shell of a Vapaad. It is exceptionally resistant to high temperature and provides decent protection.

ThingDef.label: roggwart hide
ThingDef.description: The pelt of a Roggwart. Harvested from a large, predatory animal. This hide protects reasonably well and is heat resistant.

ThingDef.label: ronto hide
ThingDef.description: The pelt of an Ronto. Harvested from a large, hardy animal. This thick skin protects very well.

ThingDef.label: Rycrit hide
ThingDef.description: The hide of an Rycrit. Known for it's insulative properties above it protective ones.

ThingDef.label: wraidskin
ThingDef.description: The hide of an Wraid. Harvested from a large, hardy animal. This thick skin protects well and command a decent price.

ThingDef.label: zakkeg hide
ThingDef.description: The pelt of a Zakkeg. Harvested from a large, predatory animal. This hide protects very well but isn't insulative.

ThingDef.label: gornt meat
ThingDef.description: A piece of meat from a gornt. It is reputed to taste exceptional and commands a price that matches the fact.

ThingDef.label: rycrit meat
ThingDef.description: A piece of meat from a rycrit. It is reputed to taste great and is a staple of Rylothian cuisine.

ThingDef.label: gorg meat
ThingDef.description: A piece of meat from an amphibian.

ThingDef.label: insectile meat
ThingDef.description: A piece of meat from an insectile.

ThingDef.label: reptavian meat
ThingDef.description: A piece of meat from a reptavian.

ThingDef.label: mammavian meat
ThingDef.description: A piece of meat from a mammavian.

ThingDef.label: reptomammal meat
ThingDef.description: A piece of meat from a reptomammal.

ThingDef.label: crustapod meat
ThingDef.description: A piece of meat from a crustapod.

ThingDef.label: silica meat
ThingDef.description: A piece of meat from a silicon based life form.

ThingDef.label: hawkbat egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized hawkbat egg. It is both valuable and delicious. It can be eaten raw or cooked.

ThingDef.label: amphispawn egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized "jelly"-like amphispawn egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: pod egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized "pod"-like egg with a leathery shell. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: insectile egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized insectile egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: reptavian egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized reptavian egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: crustapod roe (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: Unfertilized crustapod roe. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Mammavian egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: Unfertilized mammavian egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: akk egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized akk egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby akk. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: beldon egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized beldon egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby beldon. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: wraid egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized wraid egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby wraid. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: krayt dragon skull
ThingDef.description: A krayt dragon skull. Not only is it intimidating but its presence tells of a great hunt.

ThingDef.label: gundark skull
ThingDef.description: A gundark skull. These fearsome trophies were often displayed to show-off hunting prowess.

ThingDef.label: wampa skull
ThingDef.description: A wampa skull. These fearsome trophies were often displayed to show-off hunting prowess.

ThingDef.label: behemoth skull
ThingDef.description: A behemoth skull. These fearsome trophies were often displayed to show-off hunting prowess.

ThingDef.label: taozin nodule
ThingDef.description: A Taozin nodule is a piece of carapace with unusual properties. This rare curiosity has the ability make the holder "difficult to percieve in the force".

ThingDef.label: mastmot tusk
ThingDef.description: An mastmot tusk. While somewhat unwieldy as a melee weapon, it can still be deadly.

ThingDef.label: skalder tusk
ThingDef.description: A skalder tusk. While somewhat unwieldy as a melee weapon, it can still be deadly.

ThingDef.label: nerf horn
ThingDef.description: A horn from a Nerf, can be used as a weapon or sold for profit.

ThingDef.label: manka tooth
ThingDef.description: A manka cats tooth. While not ideal as a melee weapon, it's true value comes in the strange curative properties experienced when held.

ThingDef.label: jakobeast horn
ThingDef.description: A horn from a Jakobeast. While somewhat unwieldy as a melee weapon, it is beautiful and sells for a decent price due to it's "mysterious properties".

ThingDef.label: tuk'ata tail spike
ThingDef.description: The poisonous tail spike of a Tuk'ata. Good enough to fend off most living enemies.
